feedback: This is excellent foundational work that properly sets up the StellArb project according to the ROADMAP specifications. The implementation demonstrates a solid understanding of the requirements and establishes a strong technical foundation for the game.
specificIssues: The Cradle special case (0,0,0) may not be fully implemented in the system generator - needs verification that it returns tutorial-specific properties
Some navigation links in the UI are placeholder (#) and need to be connected to actual controllers
Missing implementation of The Cradle tutorial system mentioned in Phase 1 requirements
suggestedImprovements: Implement special handling for The Cradle (0,0,0) coordinates in SystemGenerator to return tutorial-specific properties
Connect placeholder navigation links to their respective controllers
Add basic tutorial quest system for Phase 1 implementation
Consider adding basic error handling and validation to controllers
Add some basic styling constants or CSS variables for the terminal color scheme
